abstract: Phoenix Suns suspend forward Markieff Morris for two games without pay after Morris threw towel at coach Jeff Hornacek in fourth quarter of home loss to Denver; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Suns suspended forward Markieff Morris for two games without pay for what Phoenix called “conduct detrimental to the team.”
snippet: The Suns suspended forward Markieff Morris for two games without pay for what Phoenix called “conduct detrimental to the team.”
